title: Claim Residential Clean Energy Credit
description: A homeowner installed solar panels on their roof and wants to claim the federal tax credit.

tasks.description: Gather the invoices and proof of payment for the solar panel installation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects documentation showing the total cost of the project.

tasks.description: Verify that the solar panels are qualifying property for the credit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the property is eligible.

tasks.description: Calculate the credit amount based on the applicable percentage of the cost and complete Form 5695.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately calculates the credit and prepares the required form.
